reviews.review_msg: 482. I personally hated the group projects because of my no-hands, smooth brain teammates. Sharam's a caring prof  but his lecture notes are not that good considering this is a 400-level course. Would never take this again but that's just me though..
Let's his brother Sharad Payandeh have access to university resources even though his brother is not even a faculty member??? Whats going on in this department??
